author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 30th All India Ideal Home Exhibition organised by Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries’ Association began at Tamukkam here on Friday.

The exhibition, inaugurated by Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao, would be open for 10 days, the organisers said.

Chairman, Ideal Home Exhibition, V.S. Manimaran said that the special attraction for this year would be Snow World , an indoor snow park created at the venue.

He said that the exhibition also featured stalls to create awareness among people of what needed to be done to make Madurai a Smart City.

The organisers said that more than 250 stalls had been set up, primarily selling home appliances. Exclusive stalls had also been allocated to self-help groups to sell their products.
title: Ideal Home exhibition begins
